trans-unit.source: Scenarios for the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology in Azure Machine Learning | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Scenarios for the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology in Azure Machine Learning | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Select the appropriate scenarios for the advanced predictive analytics process in Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: Select the appropriate scenarios for the advanced predictive analytics process in Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: Scenarios for advanced analytics in Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Scenarios for advanced analytics in Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: This article outlines the variety of sample data sources and target scenarios that can be handled with the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology (ADAPT) in Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: This article outlines the variety of sample data sources and target scenarios that can be handled with the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology (ADAPT) in Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: It illustrates options available in the processing sequences that depend on the data characteristics, source locations, and target repositories in Azure.
trans-unit.target: It illustrates options available in the processing sequences that depend on the data characteristics, source locations, and target repositories in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The decision tree for selecting the sample scenarios that is appropriate for your data and objective is presented in the last section.
trans-unit.target: The decision tree for selecting the sample scenarios that is appropriate for your data and objective is presented in the last section.

trans-unit.source: Each of the following sections presents a sample scenario.
trans-unit.target: Each of the following sections presents a sample scenario.

trans-unit.source: For each scenario, a possible data science or advanced analytics flow and supporting Azure resources are listed.
trans-unit.target: For each scenario, a possible data science or advanced analytics flow and supporting Azure resources are listed.

trans-unit.source: For all of the following scenarios, you need to:
trans-unit.target: For all of the following scenarios, you need to:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Create a storage account</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Create a storage account</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Create an Azure ML workspace</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Create an Azure ML workspace</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Alternate method to copy a full database from an on-premises SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
trans-unit.target: Alternate method to copy a full database from an on-premises SQL Server to Azure SQL Database

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Detach local DB and attach to SQL DB in Azure</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Detach local DB and attach to SQL DB in Azure</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Additional Azure resources: Azure Virtual Machine (SQL Server / IPython Notebook server)
trans-unit.target: Additional Azure resources: Azure Virtual Machine (SQL Server / IPython Notebook server)

trans-unit.source: To replicate the entire SQL Server database in your SQL Server VM, you should copy a database from one location/server to another, assuming that the database can be taken temporarily offline.
trans-unit.target: To replicate the entire SQL Server database in your SQL Server VM, you should copy a database from one location/server to another, assuming that the database can be taken temporarily offline.

trans-unit.source: You do this in the SQL Server Management Studio Object Explorer GUI, or using the equivalent Transact-SQL commands.
trans-unit.target: You do this in the SQL Server Management Studio Object Explorer GUI, or using the equivalent Transact-SQL commands.

trans-unit.source: Detach the database at the source location.
trans-unit.target: Detach the database at the source location.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Detach a database</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Detach a database</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In Windows Explorer or Windows Command Prompt window, copy the detached database file or files and log file or files to the target location on the SQL Server VM in Azure.
trans-unit.target: In Windows Explorer or Windows Command Prompt window, copy the detached database file or files and log file or files to the target location on the SQL Server VM in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Attach the copied files to the target SQL Server instance.
trans-unit.target: Attach the copied files to the target SQL Server instance.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Attach a Database</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Attach a Database</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Move a Database Using Detach and Attach (Transact-SQL)</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Move a Database Using Detach and Attach (Transact-SQL)</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Load data to Hive database in Azure HDInsight Hadoop cluster.
trans-unit.target: Load data to Hive database in Azure HDInsight Hadoop cluster.

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: Log in to the head node of the Hadoop cluster
trans-unit.target: Log in to the head node of the Hadoop cluster

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: Open the Hadoop Command Line.
trans-unit.target: Open the Hadoop Command Line.

trans-unit.source: c.
trans-unit.target: c.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Hive root directory by command cd %hive_home%\bin in Hadoop Command Line.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Hive root directory by command cd %hive_home%\bin in Hadoop Command Line.

trans-unit.source: d.
trans-unit.target: d.

trans-unit.source: Run the Hive queries to create database and tables, and load data from blob storage to Hive tables.
trans-unit.target: Run the Hive queries to create database and tables, and load data from blob storage to Hive tables.

trans-unit.source: If the data is big, users can create the Hive table with partitions.
trans-unit.target: If the data is big, users can create the Hive table with partitions.

trans-unit.source: Then, users can use a for loop in the Hadoop Command Line on the head node to load data into the Hive table partitioned by partition.
trans-unit.target: Then, users can use a for loop in the Hadoop Command Line on the head node to load data into the Hive table partitioned by partition.

trans-unit.source: Explore data and create features as needed in Hadoop Command Line.
trans-unit.target: Explore data and create features as needed in Hadoop Command Line.

trans-unit.source: Note that the features do not need to be materialized in the database tables.
trans-unit.target: Note that the features do not need to be materialized in the database tables.

trans-unit.source: Only note the necessary query to create them.
trans-unit.target: Only note the necessary query to create them.

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: Log in to the head node of the Hadoop cluster
trans-unit.target: Log in to the head node of the Hadoop cluster

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: Open the Hadoop Command Line.
trans-unit.target: Open the Hadoop Command Line.

trans-unit.source: c.
trans-unit.target: c.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Hive root directory by command cd %hive_home%\bin in Hadoop Command Line.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Hive root directory by command cd %hive_home%\bin in Hadoop Command Line.

trans-unit.source: d.
trans-unit.target: d.

trans-unit.source: Run the Hive queries in Hadoop Command Line on the head node of the Hadoop cluster to explore the data and create features as needed.
trans-unit.target: Run the Hive queries in Hadoop Command Line on the head node of the Hadoop cluster to explore the data and create features as needed.

trans-unit.source: If needed and/or desired, sample the data to fit in Azure Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: If needed and/or desired, sample the data to fit in Azure Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Studio</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Studio</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Read the data directly from the Hive Queries using the Reader[reader] module.
trans-unit.target: Read the data directly from the Hive Queries using the Reader[reader] module.

trans-unit.source: Paste the necessary query which extracts fields, creates features, and samples data if needed directly in the <link><linkText>Reader[reader]</linkText><title></title></link> query.
trans-unit.target: Paste the necessary query which extracts fields, creates features, and samples data if needed directly in the <link><linkText>Reader[reader]</linkText><title></title></link> query.
